examples.example: 我一直都很喜欢探索未知的世界，那让我觉得无比快乐。

translate.english: I have always liked to explore the unknown world very much, and that makes me feel extremely happy.

examples.example: 我很喜欢帮助他人，看到他们的笑容我也会感到十分开心。

translate.english: I very much like to help others, and seeing their smiles will also make me feel very happy.

examples.example: 我很喜欢在阳光明媚的日子里去公园散步，享受美好的时光。

translate.english: I really like to go for a walk in the park on sunny days and enjoy the wonderful time.
